Thank you for checking out my project! To use this application type a message in on the left and your encrypted message will appear on the right. Below the lightboard you can change the settings of the Enigma Machine. To un-encrypt the message simply paste the encryped message into the text area on the left. The settings must be set exactly the same as when the message was encrypted in order to un-encrypt the message.

Be aware that I make no promises this will work on mobile devices, in fact, I am certain features will not behave correctly on mobile devices, for best experience, please use a desktop computer with a modern browser.

I can be found at my GitHub: TrippBarker

Below the lightboard you can change the settings of the Enigma Machine. To un-encrypt the message simply paste the encryped message into the text area on the left. The settings must be set exactly the same as when the message was encrypted in order to un-encrypt the message.

Be aware that I make no promises this will work on mobile devices, in fact, I am certain features will not behave correctly on mobile devices, for best experience, please use a desktop computer with a modern browser.

I can be found at my GitHub: TrippBarker

Below the lightboard you can change the settings of the Enigma Machine. To un-encrypt the message simply paste the encryped message into the text area on the left. The settings must be set exactly the same as when the message was encrypted in order to un-encrypt the message.

Be aware that I make no promises this will work on mobile devices, in fact, I am certain features will not behave correctly on mobile devices, for best experience, please use a desktop computer with a modern browser.

I can be found at my GitHub: TrippBarker

Below the lightboard you can change the settings of the Enigma Machine. To un-encrypt the message simply paste the encryped message into the text area on the left. The settings must be set exactly the same as when the message was encrypted in order to un-encrypt the message.

Be aware that I make no promises this will work on mobile devices, in fact, I am certain features will not behave correctly on mobile devices, for best experience, please use a desktop computer with a modern browser.

I can be found at my GitHub: TrippBarker

Below the lightboard you can change the settings of the Enigma Machine. To un-encrypt the message simply paste the encryped message into the text area on the left. The settings must be set exactly the same as when the message was encrypted in order to un-encrypt the message.

Be aware that I make no promises this will work on mobile devices, in fact, I am certain features will not behave correctly on mobile devices, for best experience, please use a desktop computer with a modern browser.

I can be found at my GitHub: TrippBarker

Below the lightboard you can change the settings of the Enigma Machine. To un-encrypt the message simply paste the encryped message into the text area on the left. The settings must be set exactly the same as when the message was encrypted in order to un-encrypt the message.

Be aware that I make no promises this will work on mobile devices, in fact, I am certain features will not behave correctly on mobile devices, for best experience, please use a desktop computer with a modern browser.

I can be found at my GitHub: TrippBarker
